verses.1: Tua ciangin Shuah gam mi Bildad in dawng a,
verses.2: “Tua bang thu bang tanvei gengen dinga, bang tanvei paupau ding na hi hiam?
verses.3: Pasian in thutang a zang lo sa na hi hiam? Vanglian pa in thuman a zang lo sa na hi hiam?
verses.4: Na tate ama tungah khial a, amauʼ mawhnate amaute a tuaksak ahi hi.
verses.5: A hun lai-in Pasian zong inla, Vanglian paʼ hehpih nading thuum lecin,
verses.6: nang dikin thutang kisa mahmah na hih leh pel loin amah in nang hong en dinga, na thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi.
verses.7: Tua hileh, na zawn mahmah khit hangin a tawpna ah na haukik ding hi.
verses.8: “Khangluiteʼ thu kantel inla, pute pateʼ tuah sa thute ngaihsun pha in.
verses.9: Eite pen zan mah mi ihi a, bangmah i thei kei hi. Leitung a i nuntakna pen niliim bang lel ahi hi.
verses.10: Amaute in nang hong hilhin, a thu hong genin, amauʼ phawk sa thute hong gen ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.11: “Ciknawng om lohna ah laiphai kung po thei ahi hiam? Tui om lohna ah pumpeeng pung thei ahi hiam?
verses.12: Ahi zongin tuate a pak kimlai a phuk hun nai lopi-in kungno dang khempeuh sangin keu masa zaw hi.
verses.13: Pasian a mangngilhte tua bangmah ahi hi. Pasian a don lo miteʼ lametna a bei ta ahi hi.
verses.14: Ama kimuanna maimom khau bang hi lel a, ama ki-upna maimom bu bang hi lel hi.
verses.15: A inn tungah kingam a, a inn hoi hi. A inn lencip a, ahi zongin kip zo lo hi.
verses.16: “Amah pen nitaang sungah hoihtakin a khang kungno, a huan sungah a dawn hilhhelh kungno ahi hi.
verses.17: Ahi zongin suangtum lakah a zung a kivial gawp, suang tawphah a phu kha zung a suak hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin mi khatpeuh in a phung pan zungbawh a, ‘Cikmahin nang hong thei ngei peuhmah kei ing,’ ci-in a lawn khia hi.
verses.19: Hih bang danin ama nuntakna bei a, lei sung panin kung dangte hong po khia hi.
verses.20: “Thei tel in; Pasian in cikmah hunin mawhbaang lo mite nil khia lo dinga, gamtat sia mite huh ngei lo ding hi.
verses.21: Na muk ah lungdam nuihna hong omsak dinga, na kam sungah lungdam a kikona hong omsak ding hi.
verses.22: Nang hong mudahte in maizumna ngah ding uh a, migiloteʼ puanbuk maimang ding hi,” a ci hi.
